txt.en: 'Now that you have chosen a clan, you must learn how to further strengthen and enhance yourself so that you are more than a distraction against the enemy. Return to the location you arrived and speak with Ashrokil. They will show you the power that corruption can provide.'
Malavin, the emissary of Angmar, directed you to return to where you began your journey in the Ettenmoors to speak with the corruptor there.

'Always good to see the real warriors here in the Ettenmoors. I can help you survive, slaughter, even thrive in this war. You will need my help.'

The Orc swipes at you.

'Consider this a lesson. Speak with me again to continue your lessons.'

<rgb=#00FF00> After completing this quest, you will have your first corruption. To equip traits and Corruptions speak again with the Corruptor. Select the available traits and Corruptions from the list and drag them into the empty trait slots. When you are finished, confirm your selections. </rgb>
Malavan sent you back to where your journey in the Ettenmoors began to speak with Ashrokil the corruptor.
Return to your spawning den. Speak with Ashrokil the Corruptor.
